Documentation.content: Types for the Parallel Block Basic Linear Algebra Sub-programs support WARNING: attributes marked with WARNING can not be changed without making corresponding changes to the C++ attributes.
Documentation.firstline: Types for the Parallel Block Basic Linear Algebra Sub-programs support WARNING: attributes marked with WARNING can not be changed without making corresponding changes to the C++ attributes

Documentation.content: Scale a matrix by a constant Result is alpha * X This supports a "myriad" style interface in that X may be a set of independent matrices separated by different work-item ids.
Documentation.firstline: Scale a matrix by a constant Result is alpha * X This supports a "myriad" style interface in that X may be a set of independent matrices separated by different work-item ids

param.name: X
param.desc: The matrix(es) to be scaled in Layout_Cell format

Documentation.return: Matrix in Layout_Cell form, of the same shape as X
